en.quote:
“The happiest people discover their own nature and match their life to it.” ― Ray Dalio
“Persistence is very important. You should not give up unless you are forced to give up.” ― Elon Musk
“Truth—more precisely, an accurate understanding of reality—is the essential foundation for producing good outcomes.” ― Ray Dalio
“Being an entrepreneur is like eating glass and staring into the abyss of death.” ― Elon Musk

vi.quote:
“Tất cả suy nghĩ, lời nói, hành động của bạn đều mang dấu ấn của riêng bạn.” ― Thích Nhất Hạnh
“Không có gì quý hơn độc lập, tự do.” ― Hồ Chí Minh
“Nói thì dễ, làm thì khó.”
